Containers.Name: USB Manager Beta
Containers.DonateText: If you wanna buy me a coffee.
Containers.Description:
Provides GUI for USB Devices. Beta V2 version
Additional support via addon plugin for USB over IP. Addon plugin install button available via the settings page following enabling USBIP.
Containers.Changes:
- Initial v2 beta release which is same as 2022.03.26 release updated code will be in next release.
You need to uninstall existing USB_Manager to use this new Beta.
